channel.title: [SHARD] Changing the Quest Tab?
channel.description:
I posted this yesterday, but it was left unanswered. I tried Arham's method, but it did not give me the results I wanted, so I reposted.
I am on a blank Shard base, and I was wondering how to change the quest tab.
To have "Another Slice of H.A.M." (for example) be in the FREE QUESTS area.
How to add custom quests (just the name) not actually making a custom quest, but having a quest in the quest tab called, "helloWorld"
Thanks.
